segments.text: I notice the woman is polishing a plate, she seems really focused on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just overflowing, it's such a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is being so daring, climbing up like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting patiently, she must really want a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the garden outside, it's so well-maintained.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is in such disarray, it's a shame.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over, someone should help that boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing in the puddle, she must be so focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes are stacked neatly, at least someone has been keeping things organized.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice the overflowing sink soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is almost full, they must have baked a lot of cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
